string.text: "Ambush": Plant the explosive.
Follow to the designated point and plant the assembled explosive device there.
"Ambush": Plant the explosive.
Follow to the designated point and plant the assembled explosive device there.
"Ambush": Plant the explosive.
Follow to the designated point and plant the assembled explosive device there.
"Ambush": Meet with the Freedom member.
The Freedom member who saved you has arranged a meeting with you. Follow to the specified area and find out why he needs you.
"Ambush": Open the stash.
The Freedom member has instructed you to eliminate a group of renegades who are interfering with his investigation. Follow to his stash for the components to assemble the explosive device.
"Ambush": Assemble the explosive devices.
Use a special tool to assemble the explosive devices.
"Ambush": Plant the explosives at the designated points.
Follow the marker and plant the explosive devices in each of the three points.
"Ambush": Wait for the appearance of the bandits.
Wait for the bandit group to arrive at the safe point.
"Ambush": Wait for the explosives to detonate.
Bandits have taken over the area that you mined with explosives. Wait for them to be caught in the explosions.
"Ambush": check the ambush site.
The explosives that you set off have worked. The squad has been eliminated. Check the ambush site and finish off any wounded if someone managed to survive.
"Ambush": follow the freedom fighter.
The squad that you destroyed, supposedly consisting of bandits, was actually a combat group from "Clear Sky". Return to the employer and demand an explanation for what happened.
"Ambush": eliminate the enemy squad.
The explosives that you collected did not work. It is necessary to eliminate the enemy group in direct combat.
"Ambush": follow the freedom fighter.
The squad that you destroyed, supposedly consisting of bandits, was actually a combat group from "Clear Sky". Return to the employer and demand an explanation for what happened.
"Information Gathering": follow to the base of the stalkers.
Head to the base of the local independent Stalkers in search of work and information.
"Information Gathering": obtain information about the Scientists.

Try to gain the trust of the local stalkers and gather any information about the missing group of scientists and the search party from "Clear Sky". Surely someone has heard or seen something. Any information can be important, so don't hesitate to pay a price for it.
"Fang": find the stalker named Fang.

Anubis told you that there is one stalker who can shed light on how the "Clear Sky" group was linked to the disappearance of the group of scientists. Find out all the necessary information from him, but do not kill him. He may still be useful.
"Fang": hide in the Zone.

Fang shed light on the recent events and confirmed Anubis's information regarding the "Clear Sky" group. It is now too dangerous to stay here - leave the location as soon as possible, otherwise you will simply be traded as an unnecessary pawn.
"On the Trail": find the scientists and the "Clear Sky" group.
Your main task is to fulfill the contract of the "Clear Sky" group to search for missing scientists and the group of Clear Sky stalkers who went after them.
"On the Trail": meet with the Clear Sky contact.
The Clear Sky contact who gave you the contract has made contact. Meet with him, report what you have learned, and get new information.
"Revenge": destroy the gang of bandits.
Several thugs killed the mentor they were attached to. Follow them and destroy them before they join a large gang of thugs.
"Revenge": interrogate the wounded bandit.
Interrogate the wounded bandit and find out where the last runaway scum might have gone.
"Revenge": finish off the wounded bandit.
One of the bastards was wounded by his accomplice. Finish him off.
"Revenge": interrogate the captured bandit.
The trader sent you a message - the last killer was caught by the locals. Hurry up and interrogate him before they cut him up for their buddy's belts.
Vengeance: wait for the stalkers to deal with the killer.
The bandit has given you some very interesting information regarding the connection between the local mercenaries and the deputy of the clan's faction. Keep this information up your sleeve for now.
Vengeance: Return to the merchant.
Report to the trader about the successful completion of the task.
"Deceit": hide the documents in the cache.
The merchant asks you to hide the documents for the contact in a special cache. Their content is unknown to you, but the information that is there can greatly influence further events.
Deceit: Go to meet the bandits.
Give the bandit leader a couple of artifacts from the merchant. Why this is necessary is unclear. But still do it and be careful - you can expect everything from bandits.
Deception: Eliminate the bandits.
As the merchant predicted, the bandits have decided to kill you. Destroy them.
Deception: Return to the merchant for clarification.
The meaning of this order is not clear at all. The merchant sent you for some unknown reason, in fact, to be slaughtered by the bandits. Ask him to explain why exactly this was done.
Rescue the Wounded: Go to the village to help the wounded scout.
The Medic has received an urgent message from the Scout Team Leader. One of his men was injured and needs urgent help. Go to the location of the Scout group in the village.
Rescue the Wounded: Give the medical kit to Khromy.
A wounded scout will live. Deliver the reusable medical kit to their commander.
Artifact Request: Find two artifacts, Apple of Paradise and Sparkler.
Elimaeus instructed to find for him two artifacts "Apple of Paradise" and "Bengal Fire". You can find them near two large archanomalies...
Artifact Order: Pass both artifacts to the customer.
You must provide both artifacts to the customer.
Artifact Writ: Find the Apple of Paradise.
One artifact found. You need to get the second one.
Artifact Bounty: Find the Bengal Fire.
One artifact found. You need to get the second one.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the first scanner.
Jorah has tasked you with collecting the installed Anomaly Scanners. Follow the first anomaly and pick it up.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the second scanner.
Go to the second anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the third scanner.
Go to the third anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the fourth scanner.
Go to the fourth anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the fifth scanner.
Go to the fifth anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the sixth scanner.
Go to the sixth anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Collect the seventh scanner.
Go to the seventh anomaly and pick up the scanner installed there.
Anomaly Scanners: Submit the scanners found.
Return to Jorah and give him all the scanners you've collected.
Mutant Hunt: Follow the waypoint.
Snake has tasked you with eliminating a nest of poltergeists. Go there and destroy the mutants.
Mutant Hunt: Talk to the stalker.
A group of unknown stalkers approached the scene of the fight. Find out who they are and what they need. If they pose a threat, eliminate them.
Mutant Hunt: Return to the hunter.
A small task to eliminate the nest of mutants has been completed. Report this to the employer.
Mutant Hunt: Follow the hunter squad.
Snake has handed you over to one of his men. Follow the hunting party's camp, where their commander will provide you with more information.
Mutant Hunt: Destroy a group of swamp creatures.
Finist instructed you to destroy a group of strange swamp creatures that have been spotted nearby near an old fishing farm. Do it.
Mutant Hunt: Return to Finist.
The swamp vermin have been destroyed. Return to Finist for further instructions.
Mutant Hunt: Follow Zmeelov.
Finist decided that you did a good job. Return to Zmeelov and report this. It is also necessary to transfer to him the amount of money that Finist gave you.
Stalker Cache: Place a stash at the first location.
It is necessary to install the stalker's backpack issued by the supplier as a cache.
Stalker Cache: Place a cache at the second location.
It is necessary to install the stalker's backpack issued by the supplier as a cache.
Stalker Cache: Place a stash at the third location.
It is necessary to install the stalker's backpack issued by the supplier as a cache.
"Stalker caches": fill the cache at the first point.

It is necessary to fill the stalker cache with supplies and weapons. The list is as follows: the Bear detector, an AK-104 assault rifle, a pack of cartridges for it, one anti-rad, one first-aid kit, one bandage, one can of canned food.
Stalker Cache: Fill the stash at the second location.

It is necessary to fill the stalker cache with supplies and weapons. The list is as follows: the Bear detector, an AK-104 assault rifle, a pack of cartridges for it, one anti-rad, one first-aid kit, one bandage, one can of canned food.
Stalker Cache: Fill the stash at the third location.

It is necessary to fill the stalker cache with supplies and weapons. The list is as follows: the Bear detector, an AK-104 assault rifle, a pack of cartridges for it, one anti-rad, one first-aid kit, one bandage, one can of canned food.
Stalker Cache: Place all caches.
You need to place stalker caches at three points indicated by the supplier.
Stalker Cache: Return to the Procurement Center.
Follow your supplier for further instructions.
Stalker Cache: Fill all three caches.
Now you need to fill all the caches you placed earlier with supplies.
Stalker caches: return to base.
Return to base and report on the mission.
"Radiation measurements": measure the radiation level in the specified area.
Your scout leader has tasked you with conducting a radiation survey of the area. Go to the indicated area and take measurements using a special dosimeter.
"Radiation measurements": give the results of the measurements to the scout.
Return to the squad and give their leader the results of the measurements.
Radars: Place all radars around the perimeter.
The radio operator instructed you to install Credo-1E military radars. Proceed to all three indicated points and do it.
Radars: Return to the radio operator.
Radar stations for reconnaissance of ground targets have been installed. However, one of them may have had incorrect settings. Return to the radio operator for further instructions.
"Radars": fine-tune one of the stations.
As expected, one of the stations was not configured properly. Use a special control panel to configure it.
"Radars": report on completion.
Return to base and report on the successful completion of the task.
"Radars": set the locator at the first point.
Follow the first point on the location and set up a tracking locator there.
Radars: Attach the necessary equipment.
Assemble the component parts of the device into a single working system.
"Radars": set the locator at the second point.
Go to the second point on the location and set the tracking locator there.
Radars: Attach the necessary equipment.
Assemble the component parts of the device into a single working system.
"Radars": set the locator at the third point.
Go to the third point on the location and set up a tracking locator there.
Radars: Attach the necessary equipment.
Assemble the component parts of the device into a single working system.
Gas Mask Testing: Collect the necessary equipment.
A mechanic at the base has instructed you to test five samples of gas masks for their subsequent purchase in a certain batch. Take the necessary equipment from the box.
Gas Mask Testing: Prepare gas masks for testing.
Use special equipment to prepare samples for testing.
Gas Mask Testing: Go to the test site.
Gas masks will be checked in a specially designated area. Follow her.
Gas Mask Testing: Test the samples.
While the chloropecrine sticks are working, test five different gas masks with different filters.
"Gas Mask Testing": Give the test results to the technician.
Return to the base to the technician and give him the data with the test results.
Chemical Reconnaissance: measure the levels of possible chemical contamination in a specified area.
Your scout leader has assigned you to conduct a chemical survey of the area. Go to the indicated area and take measurements using the VPKhR.
Chemical Reconnaissance: Give the scout the results of the measurements.
Return to the squad and give their leader the results of the measurements.
"Faulty radio": head to the place where the radio is installed.
One of the group's installed hidden radios has stopped working. Go to the place where it is installed and remove its work cards.
"Faulty radio": ring the extracted circuits with a multimeter.
It is necessary to identify the malfunction of the working modules of the radio station. To do this, use a regular multimeter.
"Faulty radio": return to the radio operator.
The multimeter has determined that one of the system boards has failed. And, apparently, its damage occurred as a result of external influences. Return to the radio operator for further instructions.
"Faulty radio": use a soldering station.

The radio operator said that he would report to the command that the radio station was put out of action on purpose. You also need to restore its work. First, solder the damaged elements on the board.
Faulty Radio: Install the radio in a new location.
In order to try again to avoid such sabotage, it was decided to install a radio station in another area with a different coverage area.
Faulty Radio: Insert the system boards you removed earlier.
The station itself is installed. Now it is necessary to install the previously dismantled electronic modules.
"Faulty radio": report on the completion of the task.
Return to the radio operator and report on the successful completion of the mission.
Radio Testing: Go to the testing area.
A mechanic has asked you to test five samples of portable radios. According to the results of the test, he will select the most suitable one for ordering a large batch. Help him test.
"Testing radio stations": report on the completion of the task.
Return to the mechanic and report on the successful completion of the task.
At the Crossroads: Collect everything you need from the mechanic.
You have decided to support the clan deputy in his cause. He instructed you to first eliminate the group of the Lame. Take everything you need from the mechanic.
At the Crossroads: Collect a gas mask with a poisoned filter.
Kromy must be eliminated without leaving any traces. Prepare a batch of gas masks with poisoned filters.
At the Crossroads: Plant a chemical bomb with a catalyst.
In order to destroy Kromy's group, you need to prepare a special trap. Place a bomb with a chemical filling, which will be a catalyst for the formation of poison in gas mask filters.
At the Crossroads: Give Lame the gas masks.
Proceed to the group of scouts and hand over the gas masks to them, along with additional instructions from the deputy.
At the Crossroads: Take the indicated point.
For a while, you need not to appear at the base, so as not to arouse suspicion.
At the Crossroads: Wait until the chemical trap goes off.

Wait until you get a signal from an observer. The deputy man must do this when the high-explosive bomb goes off and he is convinced of the death of the group. As soon as this happens, we can consider the job done.
“At the crossroads”: report to the deputy on the completion of your part of the work.
Return to the deputy's base and report that you have received a signal about the liquidation of Khromy's group.
At the Crossroads: Collect everything you need from the Procurer.

You have made the decision to side with the clan leader in his confrontation with the deputy. First you need to investigate the death of a group of scouts and check the suspicion of Hasan's involvement in this. Take everything you need to inspect the site of the death of the group from the supplier.
At the Crossroads: Investigate where the group died.
Using a special spectrometer, take samples in the area where the group died. Maybe something will show up.
At the Crossroads: Talk to the technician.

The spectrometer showed the presence of traces of rare chemicals at the site of the death of the group. By themselves, they cannot be HOV, but together with others, they give rise to a real explosive mixture. They also cannot be the product of reactions taking place in the anomaly. Talk to the technician - whether he knows something about these substances or not.
At the Crossroads: Find Hassan's men or their possible hideout.

The tech told you that he did deal with the issue of supplying and configuring devices with such a chemical content, but he could not even imagine that they could be used as covert means of elimination. He told you about who exactly took these components - it was Hassan's people. Check the spot where they were last seen.
At the Crossroads: Eliminate Hassan's men and, after finding the keys to their cache, open it.

There was a cache of mercenaries at the place indicated by the technician. It needs to be opened. The technician also sent coordinates where the mercenaries themselves might be. Most likely, he just passed them.
At the Crossroads: Report any findings to the faction leader.
In the mercenaries' cache, there was an archive with curious documentation, shedding light on the affairs of Hassan and his people. Present them to Harold as proof of Hassan's guilt.
At the Crossroads: Eliminate the first member of Hassan's gang.
Eliminate one of the mercenaries.
At the Crossroads: Collect the key from the mercenary.
Search the corpse of Hasan's man for his stash key.
At the Crossroads: Eliminate the second member of Hassan's gang.
Eliminate one of the mercenaries.
At the Crossroads: Collect the key from the mercenary.
Search the corpse of Hasan's man for his stash key.
Svyaznoy: Meet the Svoboda Scout.
Clear Sky's liaison has made an appointment for you, just as Hassan promised. However, suddenly an urgent message came from the Svoboda. Find out what he needs.
Communicator: Go to a meeting with a Clear Sky agent.
Despite Anubis' warning, you still went to meet with the customer.
"Svyaznoy": liquidate the pure-bombers.
Svobodovsky's agent turned out to be right about the Clear Sky grouping. At the meeting, they tried to kill you. Eliminate them.
Setup: Meet Svobodov's scout.
You shouldn't have believed the Liberty agent. Clear Sky used you and decided to remove you as soon as you were no longer needed.
Setup: Prepare a trap.

Convince Hasan that it was Clear Sky who killed one of the syndicate people he was working with. Anubis will force a detachment of winged ones to go to the village. The mercenaries should also come there.
Setup: Eliminate everyone in the village.
Bleeding Clear Sky and mercenaries. Just the first step. The way the rats gnaw each other. Finish off those who survive.
Reckoning: Resupply the Freedom Cache.
To perform the next operation, you need to replenish your supplies. Do this and also receive additional instructions from Anubis.
Payback: Eliminate the stalker base.
Go to the base to free stalkers and liquidate all who remained there. This must be done to remove traces. Most of the guards will not be in place - they will be distracted by the Svobodovsky scout.
Decoupling: Eliminate the group of scientists you were supposed to save.
Complete Anubis's order and dispose of the waste material in this terrifying multi-turner.
"Decoupling": lay a landmine with a HOV.
Perhaps some of the scientists are still hiding in the lower tiers of the bunker. Plant chemical bombs to eliminate all survivors.
"Decoupling": wait for the fuse to go off.
Wait for the bomb to go off. At this point, it is better to stay away from her.
Decoupling: Meet Anubis.
The job assigned to you by the Svoboda Scout is done. Follow him for further instructions, if any.
Sweep: Search for mercenary mines
Go to the abandoned area where the mercenaries were recently spotted and scout the area for possible booby-trapped surprises.
Purge: Return to the village to the scout leader.
All mines have been found and successfully defused. Return to your employer.
Purge: Fight off a wave of mutants.
The parking lot of scouts and free stalkers was attacked by mutants. Fight them off.
Decoupling: Meet Anubis.
Go to meet the Free agent.
Decoupling: Eliminate the Clear Sky informant.
Go to the designated area and kill the Clear Sky agent.
Decoupling: contact the Chistobovo squad.
Send a message to the Clear Sky assault squad through the radio operator of the Free Stalkers.
Decoupling: Eliminate the dispatched Assault Squad.
A group of Chistinebists was supposed to occupy the central checkpoint. Move towards him and destroy them.
Decoupling: Kill the other half of the group of scientists.
Go to the place where the missing group of scientists was hiding for a long time and eliminate those who remained there.
Decoupling: Return to Anubis.
Svoboda's instructions have been fulfilled. Report it to him.
Decoupling: Kill the Sinner Agent.
At the very last moment, doubts arose about the correctness of the chosen path. Becoming an agent of sinners is not what you were going for. Eliminate Anubis.
Decoupling: Follow Harold.
Accept Harold's offer to join his faction. Perhaps this new stage will help you forget everything that happened here.
Syndicate Case: Find the stash of the mercenaries.
A note found on the corpse of a syndicate fighter hints at a mercenary cache in the nearby area. Find him. Perhaps it is hidden in the caves or in the village.
Syndicate Case: Build a stash.

You need to figure out the code that the mercenaries use to open the cache. Do not try to just break it in - most likely it is mined. The code may be known to some of the stalkers working for the syndicate.
Syndicate Case: Hurry to base.
The syndicate's stash has a surprise in the form of a built-in poison gas tank. Whether it was specifically installed or not is unknown. Return to base for the antidote as soon as possible.
Syndicate Case: Go to the Medic.
An unknown Svobodovsky scout saved your life. See a doctor, as he advised.
"Arrival": Talk to the Svoboda.
From the very beginning it was "lucky" to run into a Fremen patrol. And how difficult it was to bring them here. Find out what they need.
Arrival: Meet the leader of the Svobodov squad.

Speak with the leader of the Freedom Scouts. It may be possible to find out some information on the missing scientists. Try to take a chance and deceive them by introducing yourself as the stalker that the patrol was expecting.
Arrival: Locate the missing scout's signal.
The Svobodov leader is willing to share what he has if you can help find one of their missing people. Go to the place of his last contact and try to find his signal.
Arrival: Return to the squad.
Go back to the commander and give him the information received using the manual direction finder.
Arrival: Destroy the Duty quad.
Svobodov's stalkers were killed by their eternal enemies - Dolgovtsy. You were mistaken for an accomplice of "Freedom". Eliminate the debtors.
Side Selection: Choose which side to take.

The conflict between the deputy and the leader of the clan may take a much stronger turn than it seemed at first. And without your intervention is unlikely to do. Choose which side to stand on - Harold or Hassan.
Elimaeus' Request: Find the Bell and Frozen Heart artifacts.
Elimey asked me to help him in one case and find for him two artifacts "Bell" and "Ice Heart", which one dying stalker spoke about.
Elimaeus' Request: Find the Frozen Heart artifact.
The Bell artifact has been found. Find the Frozen Heart.
Elimaeus' Request: Find the Bell Artifact
The Frozen Heart artifact has been found. Find the Bell.
Elimaeus Request: Hand over the found artifacts to Yelimaeus.
Both artifacts were successfully found at the location Yelimaeus told you about. Give them to the medic and collect the reward.
Isai's Request: Collect artifacts from the collectors.
The purveyor has arranged with Jorah for you to collect artifacts from the stalkers. At the personal request of Isai, tell each of the collectors about the new caches.
Isai's Request: Give the collected artifacts to Isai.

The fishing rod is abandoned - each of the artifact collectors received the necessary information. It remains only to wait which of these three will prove themselves. Return to the base and hand over all the artifacts to the customer.
Isai's Request: Go to the first collector
Meet the first assembler, collect the cargo from him and pass on the information that Isai gave you.
Isai's Request: Go to the Second Collector
Meet with the second collector, take the cargo from him and pass on the information that Isai gave you..
Isai's Request: Go to the third collector
Meet with the third assembler, collect the cargo from him and pass on the information that Isai gave you.
Night Predator: Meet Yakut.
Your hunter has tasked you with taking out a nocturnal predator that has begun attacking gathering groups. Follow one of the most experienced hunters in the clan to hunt the chimera together.
Night Predator: Scout the area.
Try to occupy the local farms with the hunter as discreetly as possible.
Night Predator: Specify details.
Talk to Yakut again to clarify the plan of action.
Night Predator: Eliminate the second Chimera.

Yakut has informed you that two predators are working in the area - he noticed traces of two individuals. The hunter offered to split his forces. Take care of the creature, which is most likely injured and has just disappeared into the forest.
Night Predator: Return to Yakut.
One of the two nocturnal predators has been destroyed. However, for some reason, the sounds of shooting were not heard. Find out what happened to Yakut.
Night Predator: Get back to base quickly.

Yakut has disappeared. What happened to him is unknown. You killed one predator - and whether there was a second one is another question. Plus, the disappearance of a much more experienced hunter. Better not tempt fate and return to the customer.
Artifact Collector: Pass the package to the Artifact Collector.
Isai, with your help, has figured out exactly which of the artifact collectors is involved in banditry. You now need to eliminate it. Give him a package with a "gift".
Artifact Collector: Return to Isaiah.
Report to the employer on the successful completion of the task.
Artifact Collector: Escort Mahir to the southern outpost.

You did not believe Isai's version of the involvement of the collectors in attacks and robberies. Help the person you were ordered to kill. Take him to a safe area so he can hide. However, insist on your decision to take him to the southern checkpoint.
Artifact Collector: Talk to the Artifact Collector.
Reconsider with Mahir the details of his rescue and what you will have to say to Isaiah afterwards.
Artifact Collector: Return to your employer.
Go to the base and lie to Isaiah that you eliminated the objectionable harvester. You may have made a mistake in your choice, but this is already on your conscience.
Artifact Collector: Travel with the Artifact Collector to the North Outpost.
You didn't believe Isai's story about the harvesters and decided to save Mahir from death. At the same time, they agreed to his terms to withdraw him through the northern checkpoint.
Artifact Collector: Talk to Mahir again.
It seems that you agreed to help him in vain and did not believe the employer. The desire to cut down more dough will play a cruel joke on you.
Artifact Collector: Kill Mahir with bandits.
Isai was right about everything. Artifact Collector Mahir was one of the bandits who carried out acts of sabotage against the clan. And he led you into an ambush. Eliminate it.
Artifact collector: return to the customer.
Return to the customer and report that the assembler has been destroyed. And I hope you're smart enough to keep your mouth shut about trying to trick him.
Jorah's Request: Find the Dragon's Eye artifact.
Your customer has asked you to find one of the rare artifacts, the Dragon's Eye. Go to the specified area to investigate the anomaly.
Jorah's Request: Make it to the base alive.

Most likely it was a trap. Dolgovtsy figured you out and decided to take revenge. They did not immediately kill you - they stunned you and left you without weapons and equipment. The only chance for you to survive is to get to the base.
Jorah's Request: Seek help from faction leaders.
Duty will not forgive you for killing your people, even though you survived their cruel game. Contact Hassan or Harold for help.
Jorah's Request: Find the Black Soul artifact.
Your client has asked you to find one of the rare artifacts, the Black Soul. Go to the specified area to investigate the anomaly.
Jorah's Request: Make it to the base alive.

Most likely it was a trap. The Svobodovites figured you out and decided to take revenge. They did not immediately kill you - they stunned you and left you without weapons and equipment. The only chance for you to survive is to get to the base.
Jorah's Request: Seek help from faction leaders.
Freedom will not forgive you for killing its people, even if you survived their "cruel game". Contact Hassan or Harold for help.
Artifact selection: Perform a selection of issued artifacts.

Jorah has tasked you with selecting similar artifacts in three different chemical anomalies. This will allow us to study them much better and understand how they formed here and what should be expected from them.
Artifact selection: return to the customer.
The artifacts have been altered in a special device by anomalous activity. Hand over the received samples to the customer.
Revenge on "Debt": liquidate the debtors at the checkpoint.
Use Hasan's suggestion to help you deal with your Debt issues. Follow his instructions to occupy the checkpoint they captured.
Revenge of Duty: Return to Hassan.

You have completed your part of the operation. The rest is up to Hasan's people. They must arrange everything in such a way as to avert suspicion of an attack on the stalkers of the Duty group from you.
Revenge on "Debt": liquidate the debtors at the checkpoint.
Use Harold's suggestion to help you sort out your Debt issues. Following his instructions, take the checkpoint they captured.
Revenge of Duty: Return to Harold.

You have completed your part of the operation. The rest is up to Harold's people. They must arrange everything in such a way as to avert suspicion of an attack on the stalkers of the Duty group from you.
Revenge on Svoboda: Eliminate Svoboda at the checkpoint.
Use Hasan's suggestion to help you deal with your problems with Freedom. Following his instructions, take the checkpoint they captured.
Revenge on Freedom: Return to Hassan.

You have completed your part of the operation. The rest is up to Hasan's people. They must arrange everything in such a way as to avert suspicion of an attack on the stalkers of the Freedom group from you.
Revenge on Svoboda: Eliminate Svoboda at the checkpoint.
Use Harold's suggestion to help you deal with your problems with Liberty. Following his instructions, take the checkpoint they captured.
Revenge on Liberty: Return to Harold.

You have completed your part of the operation. The rest is up to Harold's people. They must arrange everything in such a way as to avert suspicion of an attack on the stalkers of the Freedom group from you.
Technician's Request: Follow the technician's helper.
The technician ordered to test three samples of various night vision devices. Go to the assistant for testing.
Technician's Request: Run the first type of NVD.
Include the first sample of NVD for testing.
Technician's request: wait for testing to finish.
Wait while the technician's assistant makes the necessary changes to the first fixture.
Technician's Request: Collect a second sample for testing.
Take the second type of night vision device from the assistant.
Technician's Request: Run the second type of NVD.
Include a second sample of NVD for testing.
Technician's request: wait for testing to finish.
Wait while the technician's assistant makes the necessary changes to the second fixture.
Technician's Request: Collect the third sample for testing.
Take the third type of night vision device from the assistant.
Technician's Request: Launch the third type of NVD.
Include a third sample of NVD for testing.
Technician's request: wait for testing to finish.
Wait while the technician's assistant makes the necessary changes to the third device.
Technician's Request: Return to the technician.
Return to the base and inform the customer about the successful completion of the task.
Unknown danger: get to the radio operator immediately.
As soon as possible, go to the base to the radio operator. One of the installed radars has detected something strange and needs your help.
Unknown danger: travel to the specified location.
We need to find out what exactly the radar spotted. And learn about the fate of a group of scouts that were also sent to that area.
Unknown Danger: Kill Scouts who have lost their minds.
Something terrible has happened here. Unknown anomaly, crazy stalkers. Save your life.
Unknown danger: leave this place immediately.
Psi Strike. Either this is an anomaly, or some kind of mutant. Get out of here.
Unknown Danger: Talk to the Medic.
It is unknown what happened. You killed the scouts, then the blow. And emptiness. Find out from the doctor what exactly happened.
Unknown danger: report the incident to the radio operator.
The medic said you were found unconscious. The anomaly was no more. What it was is unknown. Tell everything you remember to the radio operator.
Cech's Mission: Set up a Jammer in the specified area.
Go to the farms and install the necessary equipment disguised as regular crates.
Cech's Mission: Return to your employer.
Return to base and report to Cech about the completion of the task.
Cech's mission: set up a radio-electronic complex in the specified area.
Go to the village and install the necessary equipment disguised as regular crates.
Cech's Mission: Return to your employer.
Return to base and report to Cech about the completion of the task.
Harold's Request: Follow the faction leader.
The leader of the stalkers asks you to report to him urgently. This is quite important, so you should not delay it.
Harold's Request: Eliminate Hassan.
Harold has tasked you with destroying his lieutenant, who betrayed him and began to play his own game. Do this by following one of the instructions given.
Harold's Request: Defeat Hassan's party.
Go to the indicated area and deal with Hassan's squad.
Harold's Request: Return to the leader.
Inform the customer about the successful completion of the task.
Harold's Request: Place an explosive charge.
Deal with Hassan by blowing him up at the base itself. To do this, use a charge stuffed with a special chemical poison.
Harold's Request: Wait for the explosive device to go off.
It is necessary to wait until the landmine with HOV is activated.
Harold's Request: Return to the leader.
Inform the customer about the successful completion of the task.
Hassan's Request: Follow the faction leader's deputy.
Deputy the leader of the stalkers asks you to urgently come to him. This is quite important, so you should not delay it.
Hassan's Request: Eliminate Harold.

Hasan has tasked you with destroying the leader of the clan, who is no longer able to properly lead the clan and is only an obstacle to the deputy's path to power. Do this by following one of the instructions given.
Hassan's Request: Defeat Harold's party.
Go to the indicated area and deal with Harold's men.
Hasan's Request: Return to the deputy leader.
Inform the customer about the successful completion of the task.
Hassan's Request: Place an explosive charge.
Deal with Harold by blowing him up at the base itself. To do this, use a charge stuffed with a special chemical poison.
Hassan's Request: Wait for the explosive device to go off.
It is necessary to wait until the landmine with HOV is activated.
Hasan's Request: Return to the deputy leader.
Inform the customer about the successful completion of the task.
Meet the agent: talk to Cech.
The Czech told you not to meet Anubis under any circumstances. Follow him for details.
Deceit: go to the base.
The Czech suggested that we act according to his plan. First, return to the base and ask the radio operator to contact the Chistonebov agent to make an appointment.
Deceit: Meet the Chisnebov agent.
Go to the Clear Sky agent and offer to exchange a group of scientists on your own terms.
The sky has seen everything: liquidate the Pure Nebo detachment.
Destroy the Clear Sky faction that was sent here to clear out. Cech was right - your contract with the birds turned out to be a one-way ticket. Eliminate your employers.
Blanking your tracks: talk to Cech.
Meet with the mercenary agent to discuss your next course of action.
Blanking your tracks: clear the base of free stalkers.

The Czech told you that the original plan failed. A clan of local stalkers, now led by Hasan, has declared a hunt for you in connection with the destruction of the Clear Sky group. Most likely the sinner Anubis is to blame for this. It is urgent to cover up the tracks before the matter takes an even more serious turn.
Decoupling: Meet Anubis.
An agent of sinners has contacted you and set up a meeting. Find out what he needs.
Decoupling: expect what happens.
What the viper has told you can terrify you. Even more shocking is that he decided to shoot himself in front of you.
Decoupling: follow to Czech.
Tell Cech what happened and what the sinners agent told you.
